title: Nordic Metamodernism, Daniel Gortz (Hanzi Freinacht)
description:
What is Metamodernism? And why do some think it's the future? And why are others annoyed that Daniel Gortz (who writes under the pen name Hanzi Freinacht) is using that term in the first place?

This was a conversation in Rebel Wisdom's Digital Campfire. To join conversations like this, and to see what events we have coming up, check: https://rebelwisdom.co.uk/campfire-events

Check out Daniel's work with Metamoderna here: https://metamoderna.org/
